Description: Assassin's Creed 2 - sequel to the successful ekshena about the murderer. This time the action takes place in Italy, in 1476. Playing for a nobleman from Florence, you will be asked to perform various tasks. The main character can now swim. In the arsenal you'll find: an ax, hammer, mace, spear, 2 different swords, halberds and 2 small blade. But the enemies in Assassins Creed 2 is also not born yesterday. Archers, heavy infantry with heavy armor and two-handed swords or axes, halberdier and other soldiers will be a serious obstacle for assignments. In total, the game will be 16 types of unique types of jobs, excluding any elementarschinu such as pickpocketing and eavesdropping. In addition to real places in Assassins Creed 2 contains historical characters: Machiavelli, Caterina Sforza, Lorenzo de 'Medici. Combining various hidden objects, you can get interesting bonuses and achievements.
